entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 10:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

Temperature: 7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
